T-161631F4.title: Implement Progress Bar UI Component
T-161631F4.description: Create a visually appealing green progress bar component for the Chrome extension
T-161631F4.technical_details: Implement HTML/CSS/JavaScript progress bar with smooth animations, percentage display, and status messages. Should integrate with existing extension UI and show during automation operations.

T-4A846274.title: Integrate Progress Bar with Extension Backend
T-4A846274.description: Connect progress bar component with extension automation logic to track operation progress
T-4A846274.technical_details: Add progress tracking to automation scripts, implement event system for progress updates, handle different operation types (LinkedIn automation, data processing, etc.)

T-8A0CC702.title: Add Progress Bar State Management
T-8A0CC702.description: Implement state management for progress bar visibility, status messages, and progress values
T-8A0CC702.technical_details: Create state management system using extension storage API, handle progress bar show/hide logic, manage status text updates, persist progress state across page reloads

T-F720DB24.title: Style Progress Bar Component
T-F720DB24.description: Design and implement CSS styling for attractive green progress bar with animations
T-F720DB24.technical_details: Create CSS for progress bar container, animated fill bar, percentage text, status messages, responsive design for different screen sizes, smooth transitions and hover effects

T-CD3EE0BA.title: Write Tests for Progress Bar Functionality
T-CD3EE0BA.description: Create comprehensive test suite for progress bar component and integration
T-CD3EE0BA.technical_details: Write unit tests for progress bar component, integration tests for backend communication, UI tests for visual rendering, end-to-end tests for complete user workflows

T-A70FA55A.title: Audit UI components for design inconsistencies
T-A70FA55A.description: Systematically review all UI components to identify design inconsistencies
T-A70FA55A.technical_details: Examine components in src/, public/, and any CSS/styling files to document inconsistencies in colors, fonts, spacing, and layout patterns
test_criteria: Priority levels assigned to each issue

T-995F4D9E.title: Identify typography and spacing issues
T-995F4D9E.description: Document typography inconsistencies and spacing problems across the application
T-995F4D9E.technical_details: Review font families, sizes, weights, line heights, margins, and padding across all components. Check for inconsistent spacing patterns

T-E3957402.title: Analyze color scheme and theme consistency
T-E3957402.description: Review color usage patterns and theme implementation across the application
T-E3957402.technical_details: Examine CSS variables, color definitions, and theme usage. Check for hardcoded colors, inconsistent color naming, and proper theme implementation

T-74042534.title: Create prioritized design improvement plan
T-74042534.description: Compile audit findings into actionable improvement plan with priorities
T-74042534.technical_details: Organize all identified issues by severity and impact. Create implementation plan with dependencies and effort estimates
test_criteria: Issues prioritized by impact and effort

T-AE0C8958.title: Fix critical design inconsistencies
T-AE0C8958.description: Implement fixes for the highest priority design issues identified in the audit
T-AE0C8958.technical_details: Apply CSS fixes, update component styles, standardize spacing and typography based on the improvement plan
test_criteria: Changes tested across different screen sizes

T-0D63CEA7.title: Validate design consistency and patterns
T-0D63CEA7.description: Verify that design improvements maintain consistency across the application
T-0D63CEA7.technical_details: Test all fixed components, ensure design patterns are consistently applied, validate responsive behavior
test_criteria: All components follow consistent design patterns
